description:
Led by the mysterious woman who helped Koji save the city, the members of the Kurogane House resort come to rescue Koji. They`re much more than they seem, but they aren`t the only ones putting up a false front!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Legend! The Mechanical Beasts of Bardos!
¡La leyenda de las bestias mecánicas de la isla de Bardos!
伝説! バードス島の機械獣!
